highlights: Manage daily operations, ensuring inventory accuracy,  and quality control.
Developed and implemented training programs to enhance customer service, and increase operational efficiency.
Analyze data to identify trends, adjust operations, and make decisions to achieve financial targets.
Constantly took the initiative to lead shifts to expedite my path to management.
Trained and developed over 100  associates at multiple locations in one on one training sessions.
Accelerated team members' career progression, resulting in fast-track promotions.
Managed vineyard operations, creating and adhering to project timelines.
Delivered comprehensive project reports, including budget and timeline analyses.
Organized volunteer teams, ensuring operational efficiency and safety.
